data: Donâ€™t use comments in this config files,In this file, you can  configurate the movement of logo and the position of the decription image here.
Logo moving mode(1:Logo go right 2:Logo go left 3:Logo go up 4:Logo go down )
the time interval (second) between the first Logo and the second Logo
Logo image width on display (the higher value, the bigger logo on the screen)
Description image width (Change the size of the Description here)
Description image height (Change the size of the Description here)
Description image posttion X  (Change the position of the Description here)
Description image posttion Y  (Change the position of the Description here)
Logo generate position X (where the logo generate)
Logo generate position Y (where the logo generate)
